name: Dungeoneer's Pack
description: A specialized kit for underground exploration containing tools and supplies for dungeon delving. Unpacking equips a backpack and places all contents inside it.
notes: Contains: Backpack, Caltrops, Crowbar, Oil (2 flasks), Rations (10 days), Rope (50 feet), Tinderbox, Torch (10), Waterskin, Traveler's Clothes
Must not be wearing a backpack to unpack
Unpacking equips backpack and places contents inside
Single use item - consumed when unpacked
